firstrun_q_bug.message: How do I report a bug in Validity?

firstrun_a_bug.message: If you think you've found a bug in Validity, please raise an issue on the project's GitHub page at https://github.com/renyard/validity/issues.

firstrun_q_feature.message: How to I request a new feature in Validity?

firstrun_a_feature.message: Please raise an issue on the project's GitHub page.

firstrun_q_support.message: How can I support the development of Validity?

firstrun_a_support.message:
There are several ways that you can contribute to the continued development of Validity:

  • If you like the extension, please leave a review on the Chrome Web Store. If you've encountered any problems or would like to make a feature request, please raise an issue on the project's GitHub page.
  • If you're looking for Cloud hosting, signup to Digital Ocean via the Validity referral, below. Credit earned through referrals will be used to fund the continued running of the validation service.
  • Code contributions are also always welcome and appreciated for bug fixes and new features. For a bug fix, please raise a pull request.
